  • java.lang.Object
    • entityPackage.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    Base Class all other Objects are based off Handles collision, Screenpositioning

    watacoso
